feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit the use of hyphens and parentheses for additional information or clarification.

feature2.explanation: Lexical choices and word usage differ significantly between the two texts, affecting the likelihood of the same author.

feature3.explanation: Sentence structures in both texts vary in complexity and length, impacting the similarity in writing style.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were identified in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the differences in lexical choices, sentence structures, and narrative styles, as well as the similarities in punctuation and absence of errors, the likelihood of the same author is moderate.
